title: NPE in noclasspath
body:
spoon4.3 -x -i IndexWriter.java (attached
[IndexWriter.java.txt](https://github.com/INRIA/spoon/files/33839/IndexWriter.java.txt)
)

results in 

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
```
